positions.description: AlphaGrep is a proprietary trading firm focused on algorithmic trading in various asset classes across the globe. We are one of the largest firms by trading volume on Indian exchanges, and have significant market share on several large global exchanges as well. We use a disciplined and systematic quantitative approach to identify factors that consistently generate alpha. These factors are then coupled with our proprietary ultra low latency trading systems and robust risk management to develop trading strategies across asset classes (equities, commodities, currencies, fixed income) that trade on global exchanges.

Our group includes Aquis Search, Arbour Services, Interim Alpha, Klickto Search, Malleo Search, Research4Search and Rikruta.Our clients are high frequency trading firms, hedge funds, investment banks, asset management firms and product firms across Hong Kong, Singapore, London, New York and India and are members of a global network of prestigious financial institutions, market leaders and Fortune 500 organisations.We focus on providing our clients with the best local and international talent leveraging our in-depth understanding of global markets from our offices in Hong Kong and Mumbai.We specialise in recruiting systematic/quantitative traders, high and ultra-high frequency traders, statistical arbitrage, volatility arbitrage as well as diversified discretionary trading strategists.We also recruit across front office and server-side development, covering positions including, but not limited to, OMS/EMS/SOR, Market Data, DMA, FIX Protocol, Algorithmic Trading/Development, High Frequency/UHF, Low Latency/ULL, Equities/ Derivatives/Options, Fixed Income/ IRD/MBS/CMO/CDS, Repo, Risk Management, Quant Development/Analytics and FPGA.Roles we hire for include :- Traders/Portfolio Managers/Market Makers ( High-Frequency Traders; Mid-Low Frequency Traders; Quantitative Traders )- Quantitative Researchers & Strategists- Execution Traders- Trading Platform Developers- Data Scientists- Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence Specialists- Quant Risk ModellersOur key focus is to develop lasting relationships with our clients and efficiently cater to their needs by precisely understanding the unique needs of each client and translating them into successful placements.
